data.title: 关于门神网关
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"介绍说明","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"门神网关是基于反向代理的身份互联应用，与其他反向代理软件如Nginx相比，在考虑性能的同时，也强化了反向代理各应用的身份互联、离职摘权和应用监控等等功能。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"身份互联","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在基于门神网关应用的身份互联与传统的单点登录（SSO）有什么不同呢？单点登录是要去认证中心去认证身份的，不改造原应用很难达到身份互认，这就带来了新的开发，也就带来了应用稳定性影响和原厂的开发成本；而我们的门神网关身份互联方式是在原有应用页面接口做对接，只需在线配置，第三方应用不需要任何改造就能完成身份互联，应用是无感知，不影响用户任何使用操作，在门神网关上我们已经集成了钉钉、企业微信扫码登录，后面也会加强手机验证码、人脸识别等等多种可靠免密途径，我们集成了，也就意为着每个应用都已经集成了，是不是节约大量的成本。在应用身份对接上还支持身份桥接，简化应用身份体系开发，直接复用门神网关的账户体系。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"应用摘权","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在应用摘权上，因门神网关是身份体系的反向代理，没有通过身份认证是进不了任何应用界面了，界面都访问不了，谈何对应用的攻击，所以对应用来说使用门神网关更安全，把账号从门神身份体系踢除，就不能进入任何在门神网关里面的应用，离职摘权摘的干净，应用对非授权用户是网络隔离的，应用更安全。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"应用监控","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在应用监控上，因门神网关先认证再请求，所以比其他日志收集增加了用户维度，有了这个维度，以前想要分析却缺少维度，例如每个人应用使用周报，网页装载时长等等，以住都需要专项课题进行数据埋点才能收集到应用日志，现在自动收集全应用、全日志、还带用户维度；有了这此日志，对用户行为、用户画像分析数据更清析；还有在应用出现异常，我们能第一时间把异常报告给应用管理员，免于让用户层层上报，应用管理员才能得知应用出现异常，改变应用服务被动局面。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"功能增强","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在功能上，其一、在SLB负载权重上，我们支持随机、IP、Cookie均衡策略，创造性引入按用户进行灰度分流策略，这就意为着把可把生产机的用户请求分流到开发机上，告别在生产机的火线调试。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"其二、在应用加速上，我们采用智能算法进行动静分离，把静态资源转移到CDN上，从而让用户从离他最近的站点来加载静态资源，大大的提高加载速度，也大大的减少原应用的请求和带宽压力（请求和带宽可减少60-80%），从而达到更高的性能。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"其三、在面对广大开发人员，测试人员门神网关也集成了内网穿透之HTTP穿透，使用起来超简单，在线配置即可，门神网关里的每个应用都可以穿透，简单超过市场同穿透软件。快速部署、DOME展示，移动开发，钉钉，微信开发就更方便了。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"我们优势","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"我们有什么优势呢，掌握这个奇淫巧技有没有市场呢，小哥哥小姐姐会不会喜欢呢？相比反代市场王者Nginx来说，与他比较只是C++与C#计算机语言的差异，但我也有工程化的动静分离来增强性能，Nginx是命令行配置，而门神网关是在线向导配置；在功能丰富性我们专有HTTP穿透功能，是DOME展示、移动开发、钉钉、微信开发和测试好帮手；会用Nginx和Ngrox在简历上是加分项，我相信新人会有把Nginx作为技能写入简历。相比Nginx、Ngrox命令行配置方式，而我们的门神网关是在线向导配置，就简单多了，掌握了，就掌握了比Nginx还要丰富的专项能力，比Ngrox更方便的穿透工具。\n"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 开始安装
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"准备安装","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"目前门神网关支持Linux、Windows、Mac，请下载对应的软件包，运行即可，首次运行如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644733976044/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"再接上图界面提示，在浏览器输入http://127.0.0.1:5188/打开界面，打开界面后，会提示需要您登录，默认密码U:admin P:admin。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"应用注册","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"如果你没有注册，没管理员第一次进行，则提示你注册，如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644734226487/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"点击确认完成注册，注册是免费的，且注册后，赠送一定额度的内网穿透流量。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"内网穿透","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"注册成功后，就可以开启内网穿透了，开启内网穿透有两种方式"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"一、在线开启，在云桌面上点击“应用设置”，如下图：（需要管理员权限）"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644735048416/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"如果显示未开启，则点击开启，再点击则会关停穿透，开启后，点击穿透网址，则就可以看到穿透的门神应用。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m1":"nat start","m2":" 则开启内网穿透,如下图：","m0":"二、命令行开启，运行程序MProxy，输入指令 "},"format":{"text":"{m0}{m1}{m2}"},"style":{"m1":{"color":"#cc6600"}},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644735288033/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"在浏览器输入上图穿透网址，则就可以看到穿透的门神应用。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 新建应用
data.content: [{"value":{"m0":"用管理员登录门神网关云桌面，点击应用设置，再点击“应用网关”，再到界面在右上角点击“新建”，如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644735743969/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"点击“新增”后，如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644735792657/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"则会出现如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"其中应用标识为为新域名前缀，应用网址就是现在应用的网址。仅作为反向代理，是指不应用门神网关应用身份互联配置，仅作为应用请求转移反向代理使用，后期移除可在许可路径中删除“*”配置即可。确认后就会在应用列表中增加此，后期管理只列表中进入如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1621481967803/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"}]

data.title: 应用标识
data.content: [{"value":{"m0":"从应用网关，点击列表，在弹出应用设置页，如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1631854506906/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"点击“应用标识”就会出现如下界面"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644977638187/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"text":"授权","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"当授权选择所有人，则任何人登录没登录都可访问，"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"当选择登录人员，则只是登录过，就可访问"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"当选择内部人员，则只有内部员工能访问，同时也会自动登录第三方应用。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"当选择管理员，则只有管理员能访问。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"设置","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"桌面展示，选中，则此应用会在云桌面默认显示。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"隐藏应用，选中，则应用会隐藏于应用中心和云桌面。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"开启日志，选中，则会以用户名记录登录请求日志，方便管理员配置应用。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"打开方式","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"打开方式是指在云桌面上图标点击后的打开方式，有如下四种"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"新窗口：在浏览器中打开新的tab窗口"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"当前窗口：以云桌面形式打开当前应用"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"最大化窗口：以云桌面最大化形式打开当前应用。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"快捷方式：在云桌面上以源应用网址的方式打开连接。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 应用名称
data.content: [{"value":{"m0":"点击“应用名称”，就进入主页设置，如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644977953235/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"text":"应用名称","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"应用名称和缓存版本组成是静态资源缓存因子，当应用名称和缓存版本变化时，则缓存会从新缓存。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"缓存版本","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"门神网关会自动缓存静态资源，如果发现资源发生改变，则需要改变缓存版本，就能从新获取新版本了。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"新窗口，打开新的窗口"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"支持浏览器","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"默认支持所有浏览器，如果应用只支持特有浏览器，请选择。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 负载网址
data.content: [{"value":{"m0":"负载网址配置界面如下："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1621482440118/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"在这里配置代理的网址，支持多个网址的负载均衡，也支持灰度请求。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"负载域名","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"改变Http请求Header参数的Host中的域名，用“*”表示当前门神网关分配的域名"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"均衡策略","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"支持负载 均衡，我们可以自由选择策略的策略，同一IP和Cookie可保持请求服务器一致。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"负载网址","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"反向代理的网址，多个网址用多行表示，同时支持下列格式扩展"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"负载权重","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在网址后面[]格式设置负载权重，默认为1。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"用户灰度","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"当后缀带@则表示用户灰度，多用户灰度用“,”分割，用户灰度是指此用户专走线路，在在线调试，版本发布非常有用。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 请求配置
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"使用背景","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在应用请求，因为门神网关是采用反向代理，就屏蔽了请求的真实IP或者你需要追加一此参数，同时有此请求需要追加一此参数，才可访问，则就是需要在此处配置了。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"配置方式","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644737557147/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m1":"表示请求的域名","m0":"HOST"},"format":{"text":"{m0}{m1}"},"style":{"m0":{"color":"#cc6600"}},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m1":"表示请求是http还是Https","m0":"SCHEME"},"format":{"text":"{m0}{m1}"},"style":{"m0":{"color":"#cc6600"}},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m1":"表示请求源IP地址。","m0":"ADDRESS"},"format":{"text":"{m0}{m1}"},"style":{"m0":{"color":"#cc6600"}},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"其他值不做改变追加请求的Header上。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 绑定域名
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"使用场景","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"当门神网关对接的应用，已经分配了域名，可以把源应用域名解释到门神网关，门神网关会自动跳转应用的新域名。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1631708121247/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"text":"域名反代","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"登录页选择，只有在登录页出现选择是转到门神网关域名，还是源方式登录"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"登录页跳转，只有在登录页自动跳转到门神网关域名。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在浏览器跳转，自动检测是浏览器游览，则自动跳转，API不跳转"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"全域名跳转，只要是这个域名访问，就自动跳转门神网关域名"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 应用目录
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"使用场景","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在我们的Web应用管理中，有的需要子目录关联到一个应用下，也是开发过程中指的虚拟目录，这时就需要用应用目录了，应用目录就是配置子目录对应的应用，达到一个域名下多个应用，配置如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1631693360185/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"输入路径和对应的应用标识就可以了。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 动静分离
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"使用场景","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"门神网关，过对静态资源进行缓存，不再请求源应用服务器，从而达到资源分离，帮助源应用加速；"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"配置方式","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"门神网关默认对文件名为gif、ico、svg、bmp、png、jpg、jpeg、css、less、sass、scss、js、webp、jsx、coffee、ts、ttf、woff、woff2、wasm进行动静分离；配置如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644828378786/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"路径缓存参数表"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"flex":4,"grid":[[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"参数"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"说明"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"all"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"缓存配置的路径下的请求（不带身份）"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"user"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"按用户缓存配置路径下的请求（带身份）"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"one"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"当缓存不存在是，按当前身份缓存请求（带身份）"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"0-9"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"按配置的分钟数，按用户缓存请求（带身份）"},"format":"{m0}"}]]},"format":{},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSGrid"},{"value":{"m0":"如果路径没有配对缓存参数，则表示此路径不采用缓存策略，路径可以使用“*”进行前后比对。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 许可路径
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"使用场景","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在与门神网关身份互联中，默认大量登录问题，各应用资源是不可访问的，但有时，一些资源需要对外开放。则就在此配置。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"配置方式","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"把许可目录配置上，则目录下的资源就可以访问了，目录可以使用“*”进行前后比对。如下图配置："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1644737409528/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m1":" 当单行是“*”，则表示放开所有请求，则此应用成为请求转移的反向代理了，不再与门神网关的身份互联了。\n","m0":"注意："},"format":{"text":"{m0}{m1}"},"style":{"m0":{"font-weight":"bold"}},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 追加脚本
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"使用场景","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"有时，我们需要在对应页面或者js和css中需要追加一样内容，这时就需要此功能配置了。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"配置方式","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"先设置需要追加脚本的路径，在“追加脚本”---“配置”，配置好追加脚本的路径，确认后，回到主界面，再点击其中路径，如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1621505460515/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"则会出现脚本内容对话框，如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1621505497887/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m0":"注意：脚本注入规则如下"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m1":"Content-Type","m3":"text/html","m2":"是","m0":"一、当返回","m4":"，则会在</head>前注入代码块。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}{m1}{m2}{m3}{m4}"},"style":{"m1":{"color":"#cc6600"},"m3":{"color":"#cc6600"}},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"二、其他文档类型，则以内容第一行来定义追加、插入和替换规则。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"以内容首行首字符是\":\"作为插入和替换规则开始，后面的数字作为开始插入和替换的行数作为定义的开始后面数字定义插入行数，最后结尾处“$”表示是插入还是替换。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"例如首行“:10”表示从第10行后插入代码；“:10$”表示替换第10行后面代码。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"如果没有定义或者行数超过内容范围，则追加此内容。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 透传会话
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"使用场景","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"门神网关，为了安全默认隐藏所有应用的Cookie，但有此应用客户端和服务器都需要读起Cookie，这时就需要放开指定的Cookie了。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"配置方式","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"用*表示放开所有了Cookie。配置如下图："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1631861194707/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"}]

data.title: 内容转化
data.content:
[{"value":{"text":"使用场景","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"因为我们采用了反向代理，与原来的环境差异就在域名上，有的内容把请求域名写死，则进需要把域名转化为分配的域名，内容转化就是配置此规则的参数。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"配置说明","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"内容转化参数采用字典对来配置，在Key不但可以是路径，也可以是Content-Type类型，值有rp、rm、in、cdn、CDN常量值，也可以配置应用标识，则会转化标识应用的域名，多值用“,”分割，内容转化方式如下表格"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"flex":4,"grid":[[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"常量名"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"描述"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"rp"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"表示替换域名"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"rm"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"表示移除域名"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"in"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"表示提交内容域名信息反向转化"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"cdn"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"表示静态资源加速"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"CDN"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"表示以html资源标签加速，定义的资源标签为link,img,script"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"应用标识"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"转化反代应用的域名"},"format":"{m0}"}]]},"format":{},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSGrid"},{"value":{"m1":"：","m0":"实例如下"},"format":{"text":"{m0}{m1}"},"style":{"m0":{"font-weight":"bold"}},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"type":"xml","code":"application/json rp,wiki
application/atom+xml rp,wiki
text/html rp
/plugins/servlet/gadgets/dashboard-diagnostics in
/plugins/servlet/gadgets/ifr in
/plugins/servlet/gadgets/makeRequest in"},"format":{"text":"{code}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSCode"},{"value":{"m1":"：其中Redirect表示跳转中转化配置。
","m0":"特别注意"},"format":{"text":"{m0}{m1}"},"style":{"m0":{"font-weight":"bold"}},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 触发登录页面
data.content: [{"value":{"text":"使用场景","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"门神网关是不清楚应用登录没登录，只有靠一此特定页面来触发特定页面，去触发登录对接过程。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"配置方式","Key":3},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"22","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1631873443525/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"m1":"：触发登录支持多个设置，支持向前向后对比路径。","m0":"注意"},"format":{"text":"{m0}{m1}"},"style":{"m0":{"font-weight":"bold"}},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]

data.title: 账户对接模式
data.content: [{"value":{"m0":"在身份互联中，有7种账户对接模式，其中5种如下"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"src":"http://www.365lu.cn/UserResources/1usm4ih/1631868141234/image.png"},"format":{},"style":{"padding":"0 10 0 10"},"_CellName":"CMSImage"},{"value":{"text":"标准模式","Key":2},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"24","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"就是需要输入密码绑定的标准模式"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"桥接模式","Key":2},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"24","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"在桥接模式下，门神网关会在每个请求头中，加上当前门神网关的当前身份信息，追加的Header如下："},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"flex":4,"grid":[[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"参数名称"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"描述"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"umc-request-user-id"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"用户Id"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"umc-request-user-name"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"用户名称"},"format":"{m0}"}],[{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"umc-request-user-alias"},"format":"{m0}"},{"style":{"flex":2,"text-align":"left"},"data":{"m0":"用户别名"},"format":"{m0}"}]]},"format":{},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSGrid"},{"value":{"m0":"桥接应用就可以在请求Header中获取当前用户参数，就不再需要建设用户体系了。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"引用模式","Key":2},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"24","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"引用模式是指，当两个对接应用共用一套账户体系，就可以使用引用模式，引用模式每个账户自动登录都和被引用账户一致。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"text":"共享模式","Key":2},"format":{"text":"{text}"},"style":{"font-size":"24","font-weight":"bold"},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"就是全站共享几个账户，在配置共享账户登录账户，可以用|分割多个，也可以用~配置连续账户，但都需要保持其密码一致性。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"},{"value":{"m0":"其他两种模式在检测账户接口中配置。"},"format":{"text":"{m0}"},"style":{},"_CellName":"CMSText"}]
